definition[0]: a place where goods are stored until they are needed
definition[1]: a railway station or bus station, especially a small one
definition[2]: a place where large quantities of goods, equipment, or materials are stored until they are needed
example[3]: The business is opening a new distribution depot in the Midlands.
definition[3]: a place where buses or trains are kept until they are needed, and often repaired and maintained
example[4]: the main British Rail maintenance depot
definition[4]: a small bus or railway station
